# hasMediaCharacteristic(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has media with the given media characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
func hasMediaCharacteristic(_ mediaCharacteristic: AVMediaCharacteristic) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **mediaCharacteristic**: The media characteristic of interest, for example, [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaCharacteristic/visual], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaCharacteristic/audible], or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaCharacteristic/legible].

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the media selection option has media with mediaCharacteristic, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing media information

- **mediaType**: The media type of the media data.
- **mediaSubTypes**: The media sub-types of the media data associated with the option.
